## Conjugaison mdr

Si $z \not = 0 \rightarrow  z^{-1}=\frac{a - ib}{a^2+b^2} = \frac{\bar{z}}{|z|^2} \rightarrow z\bar{z} \in  \mathbb{R}$

### Prop. conjug.

(i) $\bar{z\pm w} = \bar{z} \pm \bar{w} \forall z,w \in \mathbb{C}$
(ii) $\bar{zw} = \bar{z}\bar{w}$
(iii) $\bar{\frac{z}{w}} = \frac{\bar{z}}{\bar{w}}$
(iv) $|\bar{z}| = |z|$
(v) $z= a + ib , \bar{z} = a - b$
